instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the prediction performance in the research on mining-induced geo-hazard mapping (MGM) and how far can this metric go?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the prediction performance of the MGM model is the Overall Accuracy (OA), which measures the percentage of correctly classified instances out of the total instances. The OA of the constructed model was reported to be 98.53%.

instruction: What machine learning technique was used in the research on mining-induced geo-hazard mapping (MGM) to generate a land cover map for the study area?
Output: The machine learning technique used in the research on mining-induced geo-hazard mapping (MGM) to generate a land cover map for the study area was Random Forest (RF) non-parametric ensemble classifier.

instruction: Can the RF-based MGM model be used to improve the accuracy and resolution of mining-induced geo-hazard mapping (MGM) by incorporating changes in environmental factors in high susceptibility areas as indicators for monitoring and early-warning of geo-disaster occurrence?
Output: Yes, the RF-based MGM model can be used to improve the accuracy and resolution of mining-induced geo-hazard mapping (MGM) by incorporating changes in environmental factors in high susceptibility areas as indicators for monitoring and early-warning of geo-disaster occurrence. The model showed excellent prediction performance, with a high overall accuracy (98.53%), Kappa coefficient (97.06%), and AUC (0.998). Additionally, 85.60% of the observed geo-disasters occurred in the predicted high susceptibility class, which accounted for 2.82% of the study area. This suggests that the changes in environmental factors in these high susceptibility areas can be used as indicators for monitoring and early-warning of geo-disaster occurrence. By integrating detailed geological exploration, topographic survey data, satellite imagery, and machine learning techniques, the RF-based MGM model provides a comprehensive approach to improve the accuracy and resolution of MGM.
